WHO_WE_ARE_CONTENT: Founded in 1987 in Saint-Quentin, in response to the local industrial crisis, 'Au temps donn√©' has continuously offered its help to those in need. Initially focused on food distribution and urban marauding, we have gradually expanded our range of services over time: from administrative to shuttles for remote appointments, literacy courses to tutoring, as well as fundraising events and activities for the elderly. Our commitment to the community remains our priority.
FIND_US_CONTENT: The historic location of the association was created in Saint-Quentin, at 6 Boulevard Gambetta... Over the years, the association has acquired a warehouse and several annexes. Whether you want to engage as a volunteer or benefit from our services, discover our different sites a difference in the lives of others.
HOW_TO_HELP_CONTENT: You can help us in different ways: by donating, becoming a volunteer, participating in our fundraising events, or sharing our cause on social media. Every gesture counts, and we are grateful for it.
